RentalCity.phoenix_description:
Phoenix is massive — over 500 square miles — and public transit is limited. You need a car to get from Sky Harbor to downtown, north to the resorts, or out to the hiking trails. With ItWhip, your rental arrives pre-cooled (critical in 115° summers) and ready to go. No shuttle buses, no counter lines, no surprise fees.

Whether you're here for business in downtown, spring training in the suburbs, or exploring the desert, locals on ItWhip have the perfect car waiting — economy for commuting, SUVs for mountain drives, or luxury for a night out in Scottsdale.

Driving tip: Phoenix traffic peaks 7-9 AM and 4-6 PM on the I-10 and Loop 101. Leave extra time if heading to the airport — rush hour can add 30-45 minutes.
RentalCity.phoenix_whyRent0: Public transit is limited — a car is essential
RentalCity.phoenix_whyRent1: Free airport delivery beats rental counters
RentalCity.phoenix_whyRent2: Perfect for exploring the Valley's spread-out attractions
RentalCity.phoenix_whyRent3: Great for business travelers staying downtown or in the suburbs
RentalCity.phoenix_route2: PHX to Grand Canyon South Rim (3.5 hrs)
RentalCity.phoenix_route3: Downtown to Camelback hiking trails (15 min)
RentalCity.scottsdale_description:
Scottsdale is all about lifestyle — golf courses, luxury resorts, Old Town nightlife, and stunning desert drives. Public transit is basically nonexistent, and Uber from the airport can cost $60+ each way. With ItWhip, get a convertible, supercar, or premium SUV delivered straight to your hotel or Airbnb.

Perfect for a weekend in Old Town, a day at Troon North golf, or a sunset cruise up to Pinnacle Peak. Locals on ItWhip know the best cars for showing off on Scottsdale Road or handling the winding drives to Carefree.

Driving tip: Scottsdale roads are wide and beautiful, but watch for cyclists and golf carts near resorts. Parking is free at most shopping centers like Kierland Commons.
RentalCity.scottsdale_whyRent0: No public transit — a car is a must
RentalCity.scottsdale_whyRent1: Free resort delivery beats taxi/Uber prices
RentalCity.scottsdale_whyRent2: Perfect for golf, shopping, and nightlife
RentalCity.scottsdale_whyRent3: Convertibles are made for Scottsdale weather
RentalCity.scottsdale_route3: Resort row to Talking Stick (10 min)
RentalCity.tempe_description:
Tempe revolves around Arizona State University, Tempe Town Lake, and Mill Avenue nightlife. Light rail exists, but a car is essential for getting to games at Sun Devil Stadium, hiking Papago Park, or exploring the East Valley. With ItWhip, skip rental counters and get a car delivered to your dorm, hotel, or Airbnb.

Perfect for ASU students and parents, Sun Devil football weekends, Tempe Festival of the Arts, or just cruising Mill Ave. Locals have everything from economy cars for campus commuting to SUVs for lake trips.

Driving tip: Game days turn Tempe into gridlock — arrive early or use rural roads. Parking near Mill Ave is limited; look for garages.
RentalCity.tempe_whyRent1: Free delivery for game days and events
RentalCity.tempe_whyRent2: Perfect for ASU students without cars
RentalCity.tempe_whyRent3: Easy access to East Valley attractions
RentalCity.mesa_description:
Mesa is the affordable, family-friendly side of the Valley — home to Mesa Gateway Airport, spring training baseball, and wide-open spaces. Public transit is sparse, and AZA has limited rental options. With ItWhip, get a car delivered right to the terminal or your East Valley home.

Perfect for budget flyers using Allegiant/Spirit at AZA, Cubs spring training at Sloan Park, or exploring Usery Mountain recreation. Locals offer everything from economy sedans for airport runs to SUVs for desert adventures.

Driving tip: Mesa Gateway is quieter than Sky Harbor, but construction on the 202 Loop is common — check AZ511 for delays.
RentalCity.mesa_whyRent0: Mesa Gateway has limited rental counters
RentalCity.mesa_whyRent1: Free airport delivery saves time and money
RentalCity.mesa_whyRent2: Perfect for spring training and family trips
RentalCity.mesa_whyRent3: Easy access to East Valley recreation
RentalCity.mesa_route3: Mesa to Gilbert San Tan Village (15 min)
RentalCity.chandler_description:
Chandler is the tech and family hub of the Southeast Valley — home to Intel's massive campus, upscale Ocotillo offices, and quiet neighborhoods. Public transit is limited, and a car is essential for commuting, school runs, or weekend escapes. With ItWhip, get a car delivered right to your driveway or workplace parking lot.

Perfect for Intel employees who need reliable transport, families visiting San Tan Village, or anyone exploring the growing Chandler scene. Locals offer fuel-efficient sedans for daily drives and SUVs for mountain adventures.

Driving tip: Chandler traffic is light compared to Phoenix, but Price Road (101) backs up during shift changes at Intel — plan around 7-8 AM and 4-5 PM.
RentalCity.chandler_whyRent0: Limited public transit in Southeast Valley
RentalCity.chandler_whyRent2: Perfect for family outings and shopping
RentalCity.chandler_whyRent3: Easy access to growing Chandler amenities
RentalCity.chandler_route3: Ocotillo to San Tan Mountains (20 min)
RentalCity.gilbert_description:
Gilbert is one of America's fastest-growing towns — known for family-friendly vibes, top-rated schools, and the massive San Tan Village shopping center. Public transit is almost nonexistent, and a car is essential for daily life, school runs, or weekend adventures. With ItWhip, get a car delivered right to your driveway in Heritage District or Power Ranch.

Perfect for shopping at San Tan, Topgolf outings, or exploring Riparian Preserve. Locals offer family SUVs, minivans, and efficient sedans — everything you need for Gilbert life.

Driving tip: Gilbert roads are wide and well-maintained, but San Tan Village traffic spikes on weekends — arrive early for parking.
RentalCity.gilbert_whyRent2: Perfect for San Tan Village shopping
RentalCity.gilbert_whyRent3: Easy access to East Valley parks and recreation
RentalCity.gilbert_route3: San Tan to Queen Creek (10 min)
RentalCity.glendale_description:
Glendale is the sports and entertainment hub of the West Valley — home to State Farm Stadium (Cardinals), Gila River Arena, and the massive Westgate Entertainment District. Public transit is limited, and a car is essential for game days, concerts, or exploring Arrowhead. With ItWhip, get a car delivered right to your tailgate spot or hotel.

Perfect for Cardinals football, spring training at Camelback Ranch, or shopping at Tanger Outlets. Locals offer trucks for tailgating, SUVs for family outings, and sedans for daily drives.

Driving tip: Game days at State Farm Stadium turn the Loop 101 into a parking lot — arrive 2 hours early or use side roads.
RentalCity.glendale_whyRent0: Limited public transit in West Valley
RentalCity.glendale_whyRent1: Free delivery for game days and events
RentalCity.glendale_whyRent3: Easy access to spring training venues
RentalCity.peoria_description:
Peoria is the outdoor and sports heart of the West Valley — home to Lake Pleasant recreation, Peoria Sports Complex (spring training), and growing neighborhoods. Public transit is minimal, and a car is essential for lake trips, baseball games, or commuting to Phoenix. With ItWhip, get a car delivered right to your Airbnb or marina slip.

Perfect for boating at Lake Pleasant, Padres/Mariners spring training, or hiking the Sunrise Mountain trails. Locals offer trucks for towing, SUVs for off-road, and sedans for daily drives.

Driving tip: Lake Pleasant Road gets busy on weekends — leave early for boat launches. Watch for wildlife on the drive north.
RentalCity.peoria_whyRent0: No public transit to Lake Pleasant
RentalCity.peoria_whyRent1: Free delivery for boating and camping
RentalCity.peoria_whyRent3: Easy access to West Valley hiking
RentalCity.goodyear_description:
Goodyear is the fast-growing heart of the Southwest Valley — home to Goodyear Ballpark (Reds/Guardians spring training), Estrella Mountain Regional Park, and master-planned communities. Public transit is nonexistent, and a car is essential for stadium trips, hiking, or commuting to Phoenix.

Perfect for spring training fans, Estrella hikers, or families in Estrella/Palm Valley neighborhoods. Locals offer trucks, SUVs, and sedans for every need.

Driving tip: I-10 West backs up during rush hour — use the 303 Loop to avoid delays. Spring training weekends pack the ballpark area.
RentalCity.goodyear_whyRent0: No public transit in Southwest Valley
RentalCity.goodyear_whyRent3: Easy access to West Valley growth
RentalCity.surprise_description:
Surprise is the retirement and spring training haven of the Northwest Valley — home to Surprise Stadium (Royals/Rangers), Sun City West communities, and family neighborhoods. Public transit is limited, and a car is essential for baseball games, golf outings, or commuting to Phoenix.

Perfect for spring training fans, retirees in Sun City, or families exploring White Tank Mountain. Locals offer comfortable sedans for daily drives and SUVs for park trips.

Driving tip: Spring training traffic clogs Bell Road — arrive early or use the 303 Loop. Watch for golf carts in retirement areas.
RentalCity.surprise_whyRent3: Easy access to White Tank hiking
RentalCity.surprise_route3: Sun City West to Peoria (15 min)
RentalCity.tucson_description:
Tucson is the gateway to the Sonoran Desert — known for University of Arizona, Saguaro National Park, and year-round sunshine. Public transit is okay downtown, but a car is essential for campus commutes, park hikes, or trips to Mt. Lemmon. With ItWhip, get a car delivered to your dorm, airport, or hotel.

Perfect for UA Wildcat games, desert stargazing, or winter visitors escaping the snow. Locals offer Jeeps for off-road, sedans for city drives, and SUVs for family outings.

Driving tip: Tucson summers hit 110° — always check tire pressure. Mt. Lemmon road has sharp turns; go slow and pull over for locals.
RentalCity.tucson_whyRent0: Desert attractions spread out beyond transit
RentalCity.tucson_whyRent2: Perfect for UA students and visitors
RentalCity.tucson_whyRent3: Jeeps for Saguaro and Mt. Lemmon
RentalCity.tucson_route2: Tucson to Saguaro Park East (30 min)
RentalCity.sedona_description:
Sedona is the spiritual and adventure capital of Arizona — famous for red rock formations, energy vortexes, and world-class hiking. No public transit means a car is crucial for getting to trailheads, wineries, or jeep tours. With ItWhip, get an off-road vehicle or convertible delivered to your lodge or Airbnb.

Perfect for vortex seekers, hikers at Cathedral Rock, or wine tasting in Cottonwood. Locals know the best Jeeps for Pink Jeep-style trails or sedans for scenic drives.

Driving tip: Sedona's roads are winding and unpaved in spots — rent 4WD for Bell Rock or Schnebly Hill. Watch for wildlife at dusk.
RentalCity.sedona_whyRent0: No transit to vortexes and trails
RentalCity.sedona_whyRent2: Perfect for red rock jeep tours
RentalCity.sedona_whyRent3: Convertibles for scenic Oak Creek drives
RentalCity.sedona_route3: Uptown to Airport Mesa vortex (10 min)
RentalCity.flagstaff_description:
Flagstaff is Arizona's mountain town — known for Northern Arizona University, winter snow, and as the gateway to the Grand Canyon. Public transit is okay downtown, but a car is essential for ski trips to Snowbowl, NAU commutes, or drives to the Canyon rim. With ItWhip, get a 4WD SUV or truck delivered to your cabin or dorm.

Perfect for NAU Lumberjacks, winter visitors at Arizona Snowbowl, or Grand Canyon day-trippers. Locals offer snow-ready vehicles for mountain roads and sedans for city drives.

Driving tip: Flagstaff winters bring snow — chains required for Snowbowl. US-180 to Grand Canyon can close for weather; check AZ511.
RentalCity.flagstaff_whyRent2: Gateway to Grand Canyon and monuments
RentalCity.flagstaff_whyRent3: Easy access to northern Arizona adventures
RentalCity.flagstaff_route1: Flagstaff to Grand Canyon South Rim (1.5 hrs)
RentalCity.queen-creek_description:
Queen Creek is the agricultural and wine gem of the East Valley — known for Schnepf Farms, Queen Creek Olive Mill, and growing master-planned communities. Public transit is nonexistent, and a car is essential for farm tours, wine tastings, or commuting to Mesa. With ItWhip, get a car delivered to your Airbnb or vineyard.

Perfect for family farm visits, olive oil tastings, or exploring San Tan Mountain hikes. Locals offer SUVs for dirt roads and sedans for wine country drives.

Driving tip: Queen Creek roads are rural and winding — watch for tractors and horses. Ellsworth Loop gets busy during farm events.
RentalCity.queen-creek_whyRent0: Rural East Valley has no transit
RentalCity.queen-creek_whyRent1: Free delivery for farm and wine tours
RentalCity.queen-creek_whyRent2: Perfect for family outings and shopping
RentalCity.queen-creek_whyRent3: Easy access to San Tan hiking
RentalCity.queen-creek_route2: Queen Creek to San Tan Mountains (10 min)
RentalCity.paradise-valley_description:
Paradise Valley is Arizona's most exclusive enclave — home to billionaires, luxury resorts, and Camelback Mountain views. No public transit means a car is essential for discreet trips to spas, golf courses, or Phoenix outings. With ItWhip, get a high-end vehicle delivered privately to your estate or resort.

Perfect for Camelback hikes, Sanctuary spa days, or Biltmore Fashion Park shopping. Locals offer exotics, luxury sedans, and SUVs for the ultimate Valley experience.

Driving tip: Paradise Valley roads are quiet and manicured — watch for speed limits in residential areas. Camelback Mountain parking fills fast; arrive early for hikes.
RentalCity.paradise-valley_whyRent1: Discreet delivery to estates and resorts
RentalCity.paradise-valley_whyRent2: Perfect for luxury spa and golf days
RentalCity.paradise-valley_route1: Paradise Valley to Scottsdale Old Town (10 min)
RentalCity.paradise-valley_route3: Paradise Valley to Phoenix Art Museum (15 min)
RentalCity.ahwatukee_description:
Ahwatukee is the hidden gem at Phoenix's southern edge — a family-oriented community backed by South Mountain Preserve, with easy access to the East Valley. Public transit is limited, and a car is essential for hiking, school runs, or commuting to Chandler. With ItWhip, get a car delivered to your home or trailhead.

Perfect for South Mountain adventures, Ahwatukee Foothills outings, or family trips to Desert Foothills Park. Locals offer SUVs for mountain drives and sedans for daily needs.

Driving tip: Ahwatukee's winding roads near South Mountain can be steep — watch for hikers and cyclists. Chandler Blvd traffic peaks during rush hour.
RentalCity.ahwatukee_whyRent1: Free delivery for South Mountain hikes
RentalCity.avondale_description:
Avondale is the racing and outdoor hub of the West Valley — home to Phoenix Raceway (NASCAR), Estrella Star Tower, and family communities. Public transit is sparse, and a car is essential for track days, park hikes, or commuting to Goodyear. With ItWhip, get a car delivered to your garage or raceway parking.

Perfect for NASCAR weekends, Estrella Park stargazing, or family outings to Friendship Park. Locals offer trucks for towing and sedans for daily drives.

Driving tip: Race weekends clog the I-10 — use the 101 Loop south. Watch for dust storms in summer.
RentalCity.sky-harbor-airport_description:
Sky Harbor (PHX) is Arizona's busiest airport, handling 48 million passengers yearly — but the rental car center requires long shuttle rides and endless lines. You need a car to escape the airport and explore Phoenix, but traditional counters add stress and fees. With ItWhip, your rental arrives pre-cooled at the curb, ready for immediate takeoff — no waiting, no hassle.

Perfect for business travelers heading downtown, families to resorts, or quick getaways to the desert. Locals offer economy cars for short trips or luxury for Valley arrivals.

Airport tip: PHX has three terminals — specify yours for seamless delivery. Driving out: I-10 East to Scottsdale (20 min) or West to Glendale (30 min); avoid rush hour (7-9 AM/4-6 PM) on the 10 or 202 Loop.
RentalCity.sky-harbor-airport_whyRent0: Long shuttle lines at rental center
RentalCity.mesa-gateway-airport_description:
Mesa Gateway (AZA) is the budget-friendly alternative to Sky Harbor — serving 1.8 million passengers yearly with cheap flights from Allegiant and Spirit, but rental car options are sparse and often overpriced. You need a car to reach Mesa's suburbs or Phoenix, but counters here are limited. With ItWhip, your rental arrives at the curb, ready for East Valley drives — no shuttles, no hassle.

Perfect for bargain hunters flying into AZA, heading to Cubs spring training, or exploring Superstition Mountains. Locals offer affordable sedans for commutes or SUVs for desert trips.

Airport tip: AZA is smaller and easier than PHX, but flights are mostly regional — specify terminal for delivery. Driving out: SR-202 East to Gilbert (15 min) or North to Scottsdale (35 min); watch for construction on the 202 Loop.
RentalCity.scottsdale-airport_description:
Scottsdale Airport (SDL) is the luxury and private aviation hub of Arizona — serving business jets, charters, and affluent travelers with quick access to upscale neighborhoods. You need a car to reach resorts or meetings, but traditional options are limited. With ItWhip, your rental arrives pre-cooled at the FBO or ramp, ready for immediate departure — no waiting, no fees.

Perfect for executives flying into SDL for Scottsdale golf trips, Paradise Valley estates, or Old Town events. Locals offer luxury sedans for business and convertibles for leisure.

Airport tip: SDL is smaller and more exclusive than PHX — specify your FBO (Cutter Aviation, Signature) for seamless delivery. Driving out: Scottsdale Road North to resorts (10 min) or South to Phoenix (20 min); avoid afternoon traffic on the 101 Loop.
RentalCity.scottsdale-airport_whyRent1: Free FBO delivery for private jets
RentalCity.scottsdale-airport_whyRent2: Perfect for golf and business trips
RentalCity.scottsdale-airport_route0: SDL to Old Town Scottsdale (10 min)
RentalCity.camelback_description:
Camelback Mountain is Phoenix's iconic hiking destination — a rugged peak with stunning city views, surrounded by luxury resorts and Biltmore shopping. No transit reaches the trails, and a car is essential for getting to Echo Canyon or Cholla trailheads. With ItWhip, get a car delivered to your resort or parking lot — ready for sunrise hikes or sunset drives.

Perfect for fitness enthusiasts climbing Camelback, spa days at Sanctuary, or shopping at Biltmore Fashion Park. Locals offer convertibles for breezy drives and SUVs for gear.

Driving tip: Camelback Road is busy with resort traffic — park at Echo Canyon lot early (fills by 7 AM). Watch for hikers on trailside roads.
RentalCity.camelback_whyRent2: Perfect for resort and shopping trips
RentalCity.old-town-scottsdale_description:
Old Town Scottsdale is Arizona's vibrant nightlife and arts district — packed with bars, galleries, shops, and restaurants. No public transit means a car is essential for hopping between spots or heading to resorts. With ItWhip, get a car delivered to your hotel or Fifth Avenue curb.

Perfect for bar crawling on Scottsdale Road, gallery hopping at Marshall Way, or shopping at Fashion Square. Locals offer convertibles for night drives and luxury for making an entrance.

Driving tip: Old Town parking is metered but free after 9 PM — use garages for weekends. Watch for pedestrians on Scottsdale Road.
RentalCity.old-town-scottsdale_whyRent1: Free delivery to hotels and bars
RentalCity.old-town-scottsdale_whyRent2: Perfect for gallery and shopping tours
RentalCity.old-town-scottsdale_route2: Old Town to Tempe Mill Ave (15 min)
RentalCity.old-town-scottsdale_route3: Fashion Square to Talking Stick (10 min)
RentalCity.biltmore_description:
The Biltmore area is Phoenix's upscale shopping and golf haven — centered on Biltmore Fashion Park, Arizona Biltmore Resort, and premier courses. No transit means a car is essential for mall runs, tee times, or Camelback hikes. With ItWhip, get a luxury vehicle delivered to your hotel or parking lot.

Perfect for high-end shopping at Saks/Nordstrom, golf at Biltmore Links, or spa days at the Arizona Biltmore. Locals offer premium sedans for fashion outings and SUVs for golf bags.

Driving tip: Biltmore traffic is light but parking at Fashion Park fills during holidays — use valet. Camelback Road has speed cameras.
RentalCity.biltmore_whyRent1: Free delivery for fashion park trips
RentalCity.biltmore_route2: Biltmore to Old Town Scottsdale (10 min)
RentalCity.biltmore_route3: Fashion Park to Downtown Phoenix (15 min)
RentalCity.downtown-phoenix_description:
Downtown Phoenix is the urban heart of Arizona — packed with museums, events, Chase Field, and the convention center. Public transit (light rail) works for basics, but a car is essential for late-night outings or trips beyond the core. With ItWhip, get a car delivered to your hotel or event venue.

Perfect for Diamondbacks games at Chase Field, Heard Museum visits, or Phoenix Convention Center conferences. Locals offer sedans for city parking and SUVs for day trips.

Driving tip: Downtown streets are grid-like but one-way — use apps for navigation. Parking garages are plentiful but meter during events.
RentalCity.downtown-phoenix_route3: Chase Field to South Mountain (15 min)
RentalCity.arcadia_description:
Arcadia is Phoenix's charming, tree-lined neighborhood — known for citrus groves, upscale homes, and proximity to Biltmore. No public transit means a car is essential for grove tours, shopping, or Camelback hikes. With ItWhip, get a car delivered to your home or boutique hotel.

Perfect for citrus picking at local farms, Biltmore Fashion Park shopping, or hiking nearby trails. Locals offer convertibles for grove drives and luxury for upscale outings.

Driving tip: Arcadia streets are residential and narrow — watch for cyclists and pedestrians. Camelback Road has speed cameras.
RentalCity.arcadia_route2: Arcadia to Old Town Scottsdale (10 min)
RentalCity.papago-park_description:
Papago Park is Phoenix's urban oasis — a 1,500-acre preserve with red buttes, Hole-in-the-Rock, and the Desert Botanical Garden. No transit reaches the trails, and a car is essential for park exploration or zoo visits. With ItWhip, get a car delivered to your parking lot or nearby hotel.

Perfect for Hole-in-the-Rock sunset hikes, botanical garden tours, or Phoenix Zoo outings. Locals offer SUVs for dirt paths and sedans for park loops.

Driving tip: Papago Park roads are looped and scenic — always yield to cyclists. Parking fills fast at Hole-in-the-Rock; use overflow lots.
RentalCity.papago-park_whyRent2: Perfect for zoo and garden visits
RentalCity.papago-park_route1: Papago to Tempe Town Lake (5 min)
RentalCity.lake-pleasant_description:
Lake Pleasant is Arizona's premier boating and camping spot — a 10,000-acre reservoir with marinas, beaches, and hiking trails. No transit reaches the lake, and a car is essential for towing boats or carrying gear. With ItWhip, get a truck or SUV delivered to your slip or campground.

Perfect for weekend boating, fishing at Scorpion Bay, or camping at Roadrunner Campground. Locals offer towing-capable vehicles for lake days.

Driving tip: Lake Pleasant Parkway gets busy on weekends — leave early for boat launches. Always check water levels for safe boating.
RentalCity.lake-pleasant_route3: Marina to Humbug Cove (10 min boat)
RentalCity.sedona-village_description:
Sedona Village is the beating heart of Sedona — Uptown's shops, galleries, and eateries surrounded by red rock vortexes and trails. No transit means a car is essential for gallery hopping or driving to Airport Mesa vortex. With ItWhip, get a Jeep or convertible delivered to your Uptown hotel or trail parking.

Perfect for vortex meditations, Tlaquepaque art walks, or Uptown dining. Locals know the best off-road vehicles for red rock access.

Driving tip: Uptown parking is limited and paid — use lots or park south and walk. Vortex roads like Schnebly Hill are rough; 4WD recommended.
RentalCity.westgate_description:
Westgate is the entertainment epicenter of Glendale — a massive district with shops, restaurants, bars, and events next to State Farm Stadium. No transit means a car is essential for game days or mall runs. With ItWhip, get a car delivered to your parking spot or hotel.

Perfect for Cardinals tailgates, concerts at Desert Diamond Arena, or shopping at Tanger Outlets. Locals offer trucks for events and sedans for daily needs.

Driving tip: Westgate parking is chaotic during events — arrive 2 hours early. Use the 101 Loop to avoid I-17 backups.
RentalCity.westgate_whyRent1: Free delivery for concerts and games
RentalCity.westgate_route3: Westgate to Glendale Historic District (5 min)
RentalCity.talking-stick_description:
Talking Stick District is Scottsdale's entertainment and golf mecca — home to Talking Stick Resort & Casino, Salt River Fields (spring training), and premier courses. No transit means a car is essential for casino nights or tee times. With ItWhip, get a car delivered to your resort or clubhouse.

Perfect for casino gaming, Diamondbacks/Rockies spring training, or golf at Talking Stick Golf Club. Locals offer luxury for evenings and SUVs for outings.

Driving tip: Talking Stick Way gets crowded during events — use the 101 Loop. Parking at the casino is free but valet for convenience.
RentalCity.talking-stick_whyRent0: No transit to casino and golf
RentalCity.talking-stick_whyRent2: Perfect for tubing and aquarium trips
RentalCity.talking-stick_route1: Talking Stick to Old Town Scottsdale (10 min)
RentalCity.talking-stick_route2: Talking Stick to Salt River Tubing (5 min)
RentalCity.fountain-hills_description:
Fountain Hills is a quiet desert community known for its iconic 560-foot fountain — one of the tallest in the world. With no public transit and winding desert roads, a car is essential for exploring the McDowell Mountain Preserve or visiting Fort McDowell Casino. With ItWhip, get a car delivered to your desert home or downtown fountain area.

Perfect for hiking the McDowell trails, golf at SunRidge Canyon, or day trips to Scottsdale and Salt River. Locals offer SUVs for mountain drives and sedans for town errands.

Driving tip: Fountain Hills Boulevard is scenic but watch for cyclists. The fountain runs hourly during the day — best photo ops at the top of the hour.

Press.heroSubtitle: Arizona's first peer-to-peer car sharing marketplace built specifically for the desert environment.
Press.aboutParagraph1: ItWhip is Arizona's first peer-to-peer car sharing marketplace built specifically for the desert environment. We connect vehicle owners (Hosts) with renters (Guests) through a transparent platform that prioritizes trust, fair earnings, and environmental responsibility.
Press.aboutParagraph2: Unlike traditional rental companies, ItWhip offers hosts up to 90% of rental earnings based on their insurance tier. Our Mileage Forensics™ system provides complete transparency for every trip, while MaxAC™ certification ensures every vehicle is tested for Arizona's extreme heat.
Press.aboutParagraph3: Since our first ride in 2023, ItWhip serves 18 cities across Arizona, including Phoenix, Scottsdale, Tempe, Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Sedona, Tucson, and Flagstaff—covering everything, everywhere across the state.

q1.question: My car is from 2014. Can I still list it?
q1.answer: Unfortunately, we only accept vehicles 2015 or newer to ensure safety and reliability. This requirement helps maintain quality standards and guest satisfaction.

q2.question: Do you accept commercial vehicles or vans?
q2.answer: We accept passenger vans and specialty commercial vehicles on a case-by-case basis. Work trucks and cargo vans are generally not accepted unless they're specialty/luxury models.

q3.question: What if my vehicle has minor cosmetic damage?
q3.answer: Minor wear is acceptable for economy/standard tiers. Luxury and above require excellent cosmetic condition. All safety-related damage must be repaired before listing.

q4.question: Can I list multiple vehicles?
q4.answer: Absolutely! Fleet owners receive reduced commissions and additional benefits. Starting at just 3 vehicles, you'll get priority support and bulk management tools.

q5.question: Do I need commercial insurance?
q5.answer: No! Protection is included in our commission. You only need to maintain your personal auto insurance. We provide up to $2M liability coverage during active rentals.

cta.title: Your Vehicle Probably Qualifies
cta.subtitle: 2015 or newer? Under 130,000 miles? You're likely ready to start earning.

Accessibility.heroSubtitle: Making transportation accessible for everyone, regardless of ability.
Accessibility.sectionCommitmentContent:
ItWhip Technologies is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards.

We believe that transportation should be accessible to everyone, regardless of ability. This commitment extends beyond our digital platforms to the vehicles and services we facilitate.

Conformance Status:
• WCAG 2.1 Level AA (Target Standard)
• Section 508 Compliant
• ADA Title III Compliant
• Currently achieving 87% automated accessibility score

Our accessibility efforts are ongoing. We recognize that accessibility is not a destination but a continuous journey of improvement.
Accessibility.sectionFeaturesContent:
Website Accessibility:
• Keyboard navigation support throughout the site
• Screen reader compatibility (JAWS, NVDA, VoiceOver)
• Alt text for all informative images
• Proper heading structure for easy navigation
• Color contrast ratios meeting WCAG AA standards
• Resizable text up to 200% without loss of functionality
• Focus indicators for keyboard users
• Skip navigation links
• ARIA labels and landmarks
• Closed captions for video content

Mobile App Accessibility:
• VoiceOver support (iOS)
• TalkBack support (Android)
• Dynamic Type support
• High contrast mode
• Reduced motion options
• Voice control compatibility
• Haptic feedback for important actions

Vehicle Accessibility:
• Filter for wheelchair-accessible vehicles
• Hand control equipped vehicles available
• Extra space vehicles for mobility devices
• Detailed accessibility information in listings
Accessibility.sectionVisualContent:
For Users with Visual Impairments:

Screen Reader Support:
• Full compatibility with popular screen readers
• Descriptive alt text for all images
• Proper semantic HTML structure
• ARIA labels for interactive elements
• Keyboard shortcuts documentation available

Visual Enhancements:
• High contrast mode available
• Text scaling up to 200%
• Clear focus indicators
• Consistent navigation structure
• No reliance on color alone for information
• Minimum 4.5:1 color contrast ratio for normal text
• 3:1 contrast ratio for large text
• Dark mode option available

Additional Features:
• Text-to-speech for important notifications
• Audio descriptions for video content
• Large click/tap targets (minimum 44x44 pixels)
• Clear visual hierarchy
• Consistent layout patterns
Accessibility.sectionHearingContent:
For Users with Hearing Impairments:

Communication Options:
• In-app messaging as primary communication
• SMS notifications available
• Email support for all inquiries
• Visual alerts for important notifications
• No audio-only content

Video Content:
• Closed captions for all videos
• Transcripts available for audio content
• Visual indicators for audio alerts
• Sign language interpretation available upon request

Customer Support:
• Text-based chat support
• Email support: info@itwhip.com
• TTY/TDD relay service compatible
• Video relay service (VRS) compatible
• Response within 2-4 business hours
Accessibility.sectionMotorContent:
For Users with Motor Impairments:

Navigation Features:
• Full keyboard navigation support
• Tab order follows visual flow
• Keyboard shortcuts available
• No time limits on form completion
• Sticky navigation for easy access
• Large clickable areas (minimum 44x44 pixels)
• Sufficient spacing between interactive elements

Input Assistance:
• Voice input support
• Auto-complete for forms
• Error prevention and correction
• Save progress functionality
• Simple, clear form layouts
• Alternative input methods supported

Mobile Features:
• Voice control support
• AssistiveTouch compatibility (iOS)
• Switch Control support
• Gesture alternatives available
• One-handed operation possible
Accessibility.sectionCognitiveContent:
For Users with Cognitive Disabilities:

Simplified Experience:
• Clear, simple language
• Consistent navigation patterns
• Predictable functionality
• Step-by-step booking process
• Visual cues and icons
• Progress indicators for multi-step processes
• Clear error messages with solutions
• Confirmation dialogs for important actions

Support Features:
• Extended time limits where applicable
• Ability to review before confirming
• Clear instructions at each step
• Help text available throughout
• Simple sentence structure
• Common words preferred over jargon
• Logical content organization
• Breadcrumb navigation

Additional Assistance:
• Save and resume functionality
• Undo options where possible
• Clear feedback for all actions
• Minimal cognitive load
• Distraction-free mode available
Accessibility.sectionVehiclesContent:
Wheelchair Accessible Vehicles (WAV):
• Ramp or lift equipped vehicles
• Securement systems for wheelchairs
• Adequate interior height
• Wide door openings
• Lowered floor options

Adaptive Driving Controls:
• Hand controls for acceleration/braking
• Spinner knobs for steering
• Left foot accelerator options
• Extended pedals available
• Panoramic mirrors for limited neck mobility

Accessibility Features in Listings:
• Clear accessibility badges
• Detailed equipment descriptions
• Photos of accessibility features
• Direct messaging with hosts about needs
• Filter by specific accessibility requirements

Support Animals:
• Service animals always welcome
• No additional fees for service animals
• Clear policy communication
• Host education about ADA requirements
Accessibility.sectionTestingContent:
Our Accessibility Testing Process:

Automated Testing:
• Daily automated accessibility scans
• WAVE (WebAIM) evaluation
• axe DevTools integration
• Lighthouse accessibility audits
• Color contrast analyzers
• Screen reader testing

Manual Testing:
• Keyboard-only navigation testing
• Screen reader testing (JAWS, NVDA, VoiceOver)
• Mobile accessibility testing
• Cognitive load assessment
• User journey mapping
• Form accessibility review

User Testing:
• Regular testing with users with disabilities
• Feedback incorporation process
• Accessibility user research
• Beta testing program for new features
• Community advisory board

Third-Party Audits:
• Annual accessibility audit by certified professionals
• WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance verification
• Section 508 compliance review
• Remediation roadmap development
Accessibility.contactSubtitle: We're here to help make your ItWhip experience accessible.
Accessibility.complianceDesc: ItWhip strives to conform to Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA and comply with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) Title III.
Accessibility.complianceAudit: Last accessibility audit: December 2024 • Next scheduled: March 2025

hero.title: Trip Planner
hero.subtitle: Discover Arizona's most spectacular road trips. From the Grand Canyon to Monument Valley, we'll help you find the perfect route and vehicle.

routeCard.findCar: Find a car for this trip

grandCanyon.name: Phoenix to Grand Canyon
grandCanyon.description: The classic Arizona road trip. Drive through high desert terrain to one of the world's most spectacular natural wonders.

sedona.name: Phoenix to Sedona
sedona.description: A stunning drive through the Sonoran Desert up to the famous red rocks of Sedona. Perfect for a weekend getaway.

apacheTrail.name: Apache Trail Scenic Drive
apacheTrail.description: Historic route through the Superstition Mountains with dramatic canyon views, lakes, and Old West history.

monumentValley.name: Phoenix to Monument Valley
monumentValley.description: Journey to the iconic landscape of the Navajo Nation. Endless buttes and mesas made famous by countless Western films.
monumentValley.recommendedVehicle: SUV recommended (Valley Drive requires high clearance)

tucson.name: Phoenix to Tucson & Beyond
tucson.description: Head south to Tucson, explore Saguaro National Park, and experience the Sonoran Desert at its finest.

route66.name: Arizona Route 66
route66.description: Cruise the Mother Road through historic towns, quirky roadside attractions, and stunning high desert scenery.
route66.recommendedVehicle: Convertible or Classic Car (for the vibe)

suv.why: High clearance for rough roads, space for gear, comfortable for long drives

convertible.why: Open-air experience through scenic desert roads (best in cooler months)

luxurySedan.why: Comfort for long highway drives, premium sound system for the journey

electricHybrid.why: Eco-friendly option for shorter trips with charging infrastructure

summer.title: Summer (May - Sep)
summer.tip1: Head to higher elevations (Flagstaff, Sedona) to escape the heat
summer.tip2: Start drives early morning to avoid peak temperatures
summer.tip3: All ItWhip vehicles are MaxAC™ certified for desert heat
summer.tip4: Carry extra water for any desert drives

winter.title: Winter (Nov - Mar)
winter.tip1: Perfect weather for desert driving and hiking
winter.tip2: Check weather for northern routes (snow possible in Flagstaff)
winter.tip3: Book convertibles for comfortable open-air driving
winter.tip4: Peak season for Arizona tourism - book vehicles early

cta.title: Ready for Your Arizona Adventure?
cta.subtitle: Find the perfect vehicle for your road trip. From SUVs for the Grand Canyon to convertibles for Route 66.

hero.title: Identity Verification
hero.subtitle: Powered by Stripe Identity
hero.description: ItWhip uses Stripe Identity to verify all users before they can book a vehicle. This secure, industry-standard verification process compares your government-issued ID with a live selfie to confirm you are who you say you are. It protects our community of hosts and guests by ensuring every rental is with a verified individual.

howItWorks.title: How Verification Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to verify your identity

uploadId.title: Upload Your ID
uploadId.description: Take a clear photo of your government-issued ID (driver's license or passport). Make sure all text is readable and the entire document is visible.

selfie.title: Take a Selfie
selfie.description: Capture a live selfie for facial matching. Our system compares your face to the photo on your ID to confirm your identity.

verification.title: Automatic Verification
verification.description: Stripe's AI-powered system verifies your documents instantly. Most verifications complete within seconds, though some may require manual review.

acceptedDocuments.title: Accepted Documents
acceptedDocuments.subtitle: Government-issued IDs we accept for verification
acceptedDocuments.importantText: Your ID must be valid (not expired) and the name must match your ItWhip account. For rentals, you must also have a valid driver's license.

whyWeVerify.title: Why We Verify Identity
whyWeVerify.subtitle: Building trust and safety in our community

securePlatform.title: Secure Platform
securePlatform.description: Verified users create a safer community for hosts and guests

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: Your documents are processed by Stripe, never stored on our servers

trustedRentals.title: Trusted Rentals
trustedRentals.description: Hosts know they're renting to real, verified individuals

whyVerify.question: Why do I need to verify my identity?
whyVerify.answer: Identity verification protects both guests and hosts. It ensures that everyone on the platform is who they say they are, reducing fraud and creating a trusted community.

isSecure.question: Is my information secure?
isSecure.answer: Yes. Identity verification is powered by Stripe, a PCI-compliant payment processor. Your ID photos are encrypted during transmission and processed securely. ItWhip does not store your ID images.

howLong.question: How long does verification take?
howLong.answer: Most verifications complete within seconds. In rare cases requiring manual review, it may take up to 24 hours. You'll receive an email notification when verification is complete.

whatIfFails.question: What if my verification fails?
whatIfFails.answer: Common reasons include blurry photos, expired documents, or mismatched information. You can retry with clearer photos. If issues persist, contact support@itwhip.com for assistance.

verifyAgain.question: Do I need to verify again for each rental?
verifyAgain.answer: No. Once verified, your identity status remains active for all future bookings. You may be asked to re-verify if your ID expires or if there are security concerns.

international.question: Can international users verify?
international.answer: Yes. Stripe Identity supports passports and ID cards from most countries. International users should use their passport for best results.

stripeBadge.description: Stripe Identity uses advanced AI and machine learning to verify identities quickly and securely, trusted by thousands of businesses worldwide.

cta.title: Ready to get verified?
cta.description: Complete verification in your account to start booking vehicles.

HelpGuestAccount.heroSubtitle: Everything you need to know about booking on ItWhip
HelpGuestAccount.heroDescription: Welcome to ItWhip - Arizona's premier peer-to-peer car sharing platform. Your guest account is your gateway to renting unique vehicles from local hosts. Whether you're booking your first car or your fiftieth, your account keeps everything organized: bookings, verification status, credits, and more.
HelpGuestAccount.howBookingWorksSubtitle: From search to keys in your hand
HelpGuestAccount.bookingStep1Desc: Browse our selection of vehicles in Arizona. Filter by location, dates, car type, and features to find exactly what you need.
HelpGuestAccount.bookingStep1Detail3: View detailed car photos and specs
HelpGuestAccount.bookingStep2Desc: Upload your driver's license for quick verification. No account needed upfront - we create it automatically from your license info.
HelpGuestAccount.bookingStep3Desc: Add your payment method. Your card is saved securely but won't be charged until the host approves your booking.
HelpGuestAccount.bookingStep4Desc: Once the host approves and you complete onboarding, you're ready to pick up your car and hit the road!
HelpGuestAccount.noAccountNoteDesc: You don't need to create an account first. Just start booking - when you verify your driver's license, we automatically create your account using your license information. It's that simple!
HelpGuestAccount.accountBenefitsSubtitle: Why having an ItWhip account makes renting easier
HelpGuestAccount.benefitBookingHistoryDesc: View all your past and upcoming trips in one place. Access receipts, trip details, and rebook your favorite cars with one click.
HelpGuestAccount.benefitDigitalWalletDesc: Manage your credits, bonuses, and deposit wallet. Apply balances to future bookings for instant savings.
HelpGuestAccount.benefitInstantBookingsDesc: Once verified, book eligible cars instantly without waiting for host approval. Skip the wait and secure your ride.
HelpGuestAccount.benefitReviewsDesc: Build your reputation as a trusted guest. Good reviews unlock better cars and exclusive deals from hosts.
HelpGuestAccount.benefitVerifiedStatusDesc: Complete verification once, use it forever. No need to re-verify for every booking - hosts trust verified guests.
HelpGuestAccount.benefitSavedDocsDesc: Store your driver's license and insurance on file. Upload once and breeze through future bookings.
HelpGuestAccount.verificationSubtitle: Two-step verification for security and convenience
HelpGuestAccount.verificationQuickDesc: Upload your driver's license for instant verification to complete your booking. This creates your account automatically.
HelpGuestAccount.verificationFullDesc: Complete Stripe Identity verification with selfie matching. This unlocks instant bookings and builds trust with hosts.
HelpGuestAccount.creditWelcomeBonusDesc: New guests receive a welcome bonus on their first booking. Credits applied automatically at checkout.
HelpGuestAccount.creditReferralDesc: Invite friends to ItWhip. When they complete their first trip, you both earn credits toward future rentals.
HelpGuestAccount.creditDepositWalletDesc: Security deposits from completed trips roll into your deposit wallet. Use them to reduce or eliminate deposits on future bookings.
HelpGuestAccount.proTipDesc: Have your own auto insurance? Upload it to your account and get 50% off your security deposit on every booking. That's money back in your pocket!
HelpGuestAccount.paymentSecuritySubtitle: How we protect your payment information
HelpGuestAccount.poweredByStripeDesc: All payments are processed through Stripe - the same payment platform used by Amazon, Google, and millions of businesses worldwide.
HelpGuestAccount.neverStoreCardDesc: Your card numbers, CVV, and sensitive payment details go directly to Stripe. We never see or store this information on our servers.
HelpGuestAccount.whatWeStoreDesc: We only store a Stripe customer ID to link your payment methods. Card details remain securely with Stripe, PCI-DSS compliant and encrypted.
HelpGuestAccount.authorizationHoldsDesc: When booking, we authorize (hold) funds but don't charge until host approval. If declined, the hold is released automatically.
HelpGuestAccount.secureDepositsDesc: Security deposits are held by Stripe, not us. After your trip with no issues, deposits are released back to your card automatically.
HelpGuestAccount.identityDataSubtitle: How we handle your personal information
HelpGuestAccount.identityDataIntro: Your privacy matters. Here's exactly what we store and what remains with our secure partners:
HelpGuestAccount.itwhipStoresProfile: Basic profile info: Name, email, phone number from your account
HelpGuestAccount.itwhipStoresDL: Driver's license data: Name, license number, expiration date, state (for booking verification)
HelpGuestAccount.itwhipStoresBookings: Booking history: Past trips, reviews, and preferences
HelpGuestAccount.itwhipStoresVerification: Verification status: Whether you've completed identity verification
HelpGuestAccount.stripeStoresCard: Full card details: Card numbers, expiration, CVV - all encrypted
HelpGuestAccount.stripeStoresIdentity: Identity documents: Full DL images and selfie from Stripe Identity verification
HelpGuestAccount.stripeStoresBiometric: Biometric data: Selfie facial matching for identity verification
HelpGuestAccount.stripeStoresTransactions: Transaction history: Full payment records and receipts
HelpGuestAccount.dataProtectedNote: Your data is protected. We use encryption at rest and in transit. Stripe is PCI-DSS Level 1 certified (highest security standard). You can request deletion of your data anytime by contacting support.
HelpGuestAccount.accountLinkingSubtitle: Connect your guest and host accounts
HelpGuestAccount.switchGuestHostDesc: Are you also a host on ItWhip? Link your guest and host accounts to seamlessly switch between roles. Use the role switcher in the header to toggle between your guest profile (for booking cars) and your host dashboard (for managing your fleet).
HelpGuestAccount.oneIdentityDesc: Since one driver's license equals one person, you can only link one host account to your guest profile and vice versa.
HelpGuestAccount.whyHostsNeedGuestDesc: Hosts cannot book cars with their host account. To rent a vehicle, hosts must use a linked guest account under the same identity.
HelpGuestAccount.howToLinkGuest: How to link: Go to your profile Settings → Account Linking, enter your other account's email, and verify with a code sent to that email. Once linked, you'll see a role switcher appear in the header.
HelpGuestAccount.dataPrivacySubtitle: Export your data or delete your account anytime
HelpGuestAccount.downloadDataDesc: Export a PDF containing all your account information:
HelpGuestAccount.downloadDataLocation: Find this in: Profile → Settings → Download My Data
HelpGuestAccount.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account if you no longer need it.
HelpGuestAccount.gracePeriodDesc: Your account is scheduled for deletion, not immediately removed. Changed your mind? Simply log in within 30 days to cancel.
HelpGuestAccount.deleteAccountLocation: Find this in: Profile → Settings → Danger Zone
HelpGuestAccount.faq1Question: Do I need an account to book a car?
HelpGuestAccount.faq1Answer: No! You can start booking as a guest. When you verify your identity during booking, we automatically create your account using your driver's license information. No signup forms needed.
HelpGuestAccount.faq2Answer: Your card is authorized (held) when you submit your booking, but NOT charged until the host approves your request. If declined, the authorization is released and you're never charged.
HelpGuestAccount.faq3Answer: After booking, you'll receive an email confirmation. The host reviews your request (usually within hours). Once approved, you'll complete onboarding (Stripe verification) and coordinate pickup details with the host.
HelpGuestAccount.faq4Question: How do credits and bonuses work?
HelpGuestAccount.faq4Answer: Credits and bonuses are automatically applied to eligible bookings at checkout. You can view your balances in your account dashboard. Credits typically cover rental costs, while deposit wallet funds reduce your security deposit.
HelpGuestAccount.faq5Answer: Yes, cancellation policies vary by host. Free cancellation is typically available up to 24-48 hours before pickup. Check the specific car's cancellation policy before booking.
HelpGuestAccount.faq6Answer: You need a valid driver's license (not expired). For booking, upload your DL front and back. During onboarding, you'll complete Stripe Identity verification which includes a selfie. Having your own auto insurance can reduce your deposit by 50%.
HelpGuestAccount.faq7Question: How is ItWhip different from traditional rentals?
HelpGuestAccount.faq7Answer: ItWhip is a peer-to-peer platform where local hosts share their personal vehicles. This means more variety, better prices, and a personal touch. Unlike big rental companies, you're renting from real people in your community.
HelpGuestAccount.faq8Question: What if something goes wrong during my trip?
HelpGuestAccount.faq8Answer: ItWhip provides 24/7 support for all trips. Every booking includes insurance coverage. In case of accidents, breakdowns, or issues, contact us immediately and we'll help coordinate with the host and insurance.
HelpGuestAccount.ctaSubtitle: Find the perfect car for your next trip in Arizona.

HelpChoe.metaTitle: Meet Choé | AI Car Booking Assistant | ItWhip
HelpChoe.metaDescription: Choé (Kow-We) is ItWhip's AI-powered car booking assistant. Learn how Choé helps you find the perfect rental car in Arizona through natural conversation.
HelpChoe.heroDisclaimer: Choé is AI-powered and can make mistakes. Always verify booking details.
HelpChoe.aboutSubtitlePre: ItWhip's proprietary AI booking assistant. Not a search box. Not a chatbot. A
HelpChoe.aboutSubtitlePost: that understands what you need and finds it for you.
HelpChoe.aboutPoint1Desc: Choé is a booking companion powered by advanced language models. It understands context, calculates budgets, and actually books cars.
HelpChoe.aboutPoint2Desc: Type like you're texting a friend. No dropdowns. No filters. Just tell Choé what you need.
HelpChoe.aboutPoint3Desc: Choé knows Arizona — weather patterns, traffic, neighborhoods, and local hosts. Built for the desert, expanding globally.
HelpChoe.aboutPoint4Desc: Choé learns from every conversation to get smarter. New features and capabilities added regularly.
HelpChoe.aboutCloudDesc: The AI infrastructure behind Choé. Available for developers and businesses.
HelpChoe.howItWorksSubtitle: From "I need a car" to "You're booked" in 7 simple steps
HelpChoe.workflowStep1Desc: Just type naturally. Location, dates, preferences — Choé understands.
HelpChoe.workflowStep1Example: "I need an SUV in Phoenix for next weekend, under $60/day"
HelpChoe.workflowStep2Desc: Real-time search across all available vehicles. Weather and traffic considered.
HelpChoe.workflowStep3Desc: See matching vehicles with photos, prices, and features. Ask follow-up questions.
HelpChoe.workflowStep4Desc: Pick the car you want. Choé shows you the full breakdown — no hidden fees.
HelpChoe.workflowStep5Desc: Quick ID verification for first-time users. Already verified? Skip this step.
HelpChoe.workflowStep6Desc: Powered by Stripe. Your card is authorized but not charged until host approval.
HelpChoe.workflowStep7Desc: Confirmation email sent. Coordinate pickup with your host. Hit the road.
HelpChoe.showcaseSubtitle: From conversation to confirmed booking in under a minute
HelpChoe.featuresSubtitle: What makes Choé more than just a search box
HelpChoe.feature1Desc: Finds matching cars in seconds. No more scrolling through endless listings.
HelpChoe.feature1Details: Choé searches our entire Arizona inventory in real-time, filtering by your preferences including location, dates, price range, and vehicle type. Results are sorted by relevance and best match for your needs.
HelpChoe.feature2Desc: Recommends vehicles based on Arizona weather. Convertible when it's sunny, SUV when it rains.
HelpChoe.feature2Details: Integrated with live weather data for Phoenix, Scottsdale, Tempe, and all Arizona cities. Choé factors in temperature, precipitation, and UV index when suggesting vehicles for your trip.
HelpChoe.feature3Desc: "$500 for 4 days" — Choé calculates your daily rate and finds cars that fit.
HelpChoe.feature3Details: Tell Choé your total budget and trip length. The AI calculates your maximum daily rate, factors in service fees and taxes, and shows only vehicles within your budget. No surprises at checkout.
HelpChoe.feature4Desc: Prioritizes cars with no security deposit. Keep your money in your pocket.
HelpChoe.feature4Details: Many ItWhip hosts offer zero-deposit rentals. Just say "no deposit" and Choé filters to show only cars where you won't need to put down a security deposit upfront.
HelpChoe.feature5Desc: Type like you're texting a friend. "I need an SUV for 6 people, under $50/day."
HelpChoe.feature5Details: No forms, no dropdowns, no filter menus. Just describe what you need in plain English. Choé understands context, preferences, and even vague requests like "something nice for a date night."
HelpChoe.feature6Desc: Protected against abuse and prompt injection. Your conversations are safe.
HelpChoe.feature6Details: Choé includes bot detection, rate limiting, input validation, prompt injection prevention, and end-to-end encryption. Your personal data and payment information are protected at every step.
HelpChoe.feature7Desc: Complex queries get deeper reasoning. Choé thinks harder when you need it.
HelpChoe.feature7Details: When you ask complex questions like "best car for a family road trip to Sedona with a baby seat and under $60/day", Choé takes extra time to reason through all requirements and find the perfect match.
HelpChoe.feature8Desc: Understands "cheap" means budget-friendly. "Nice" means luxury. No filters needed.
HelpChoe.feature8Details: Choé interprets subjective terms: "cheap" filters to economy class, "spacious" looks for SUVs and minivans, "fun" suggests convertibles and sports cars. The AI learns from context to give you exactly what you mean.
HelpChoe.tripPlannerSubtitle: Not "here's a Pinterest board" — an AI that pulls <highlight>real-time local data</highlight> and builds actionable itineraries with live bookings.
HelpChoe.tripPlannerTipValue: Leave by 7 AM Saturday for Sedona day trip
HelpChoe.tripPlannerTagline: One conversation. Everything connected. Car is booked.
HelpChoe.commerceSubtitle: The engine behind Choé isn't car-rental-specific. The pattern is universal.
HelpChoe.commerceTagline: "The decision layer is worth more than the payment layer because it comes first."
HelpChoe.autoSubtitle: The first AI that lives in your car and handles commerce while you drive. CarPlay & Android Auto integration.
HelpChoe.autoVoiceResp1: You have 3 vehicles saved. Number 1: 2024 Toyota Camry, $45/day, Phoenix pickup...
HelpChoe.autoVoiceResp2: Toyota Camry for March 15-18. Total: $180. Pay with Visa ending 4242?
HelpChoe.autoVoiceResp3: Booked! Confirmation sent to your phone. Drive safe.
HelpChoe.autoComplete: Booking complete - hands never left the wheel
HelpChoe.autoSafetyDesc: While driving, Choé is <voiceOnly>voice-only</voiceOnly>. No visual browsing. No scrolling. Full browsing with photos and comparisons is for when you're parked.
HelpChoe.developerSubtitle: The AI infrastructure for car rental — and eventually, all commerce. Add conversational booking to your platform.
HelpChoe.securityLayer2Desc: Prevents abuse with smart request throttling
HelpChoe.securityLayer4Desc: All conversations encrypted in transit and at rest
HelpChoe.securityPrivacy1: Conversations are NOT sold to third parties
HelpChoe.securityPrivacy2: Data used only to improve your experience
HelpChoe.securityPrivacy4: No training on your personal data without consent
HelpChoe.securityInfraNote: Choé runs on secure cloud infrastructure with automatic backups, redundancy, and 24/7 monitoring. Powered by industry-standard security practices.
HelpChoe.tipsSubtitle: Get the most out of your conversations with Choé
HelpChoe.tip1Desc: Tell Choé exactly where you need the car. City, neighborhood, or even airport.
HelpChoe.tip1Example: "SUV in Scottsdale near Old Town" or "car near Phoenix Sky Harbor"
HelpChoe.tip2Desc: Choé can calculate daily rates from a total budget. No math required.
HelpChoe.tip2Example: "$400 total for 5 days" → Choé finds cars under $80/day
HelpChoe.tip3Desc: SUV, sedan, electric, luxury, rideshare-ready — Choé knows them all.
HelpChoe.tip3Example: "I need something for DoorDash" → Choé finds rideshare-approved cars
HelpChoe.tip4Desc: Choé can search with or without dates, but specific dates get better results.
HelpChoe.tip5Desc: Didn't find what you want? Ask Choé to filter more, show different options, or explain features.
HelpChoe.tip5Example: "Show me only cars with no deposit" or "What about electric cars?"
HelpChoe.tip6Desc: Many of our hosts offer cars with no security deposit. Just ask!
HelpChoe.tip6Example: "I want a car with no deposit required"
HelpChoe.faqAnswer1: No. Choé is an AI-powered booking assistant created by ItWhip. Choé uses advanced language models to understand your needs and find the perfect car. While Choé feels conversational, there's no human on the other end — just really smart AI.
HelpChoe.faqQuestion2: How does Choé find cars so fast?
HelpChoe.faqAnswer2: Choé searches our real-time inventory database the moment you describe what you need. There's no loading of separate pages or clicking through filters — Choé translates your natural language into an instant search and returns matching vehicles in seconds.
HelpChoe.faqAnswer3: Yes. While Choé is highly accurate, it's still AI and can occasionally misunderstand requests or provide incorrect information. Always verify booking details (dates, prices, vehicle) before confirming. If something looks wrong, just tell Choé and it will correct itself.
HelpChoe.faqQuestion4: Is my conversation with Choé private?
HelpChoe.faqAnswer4: Yes. Your conversations are not sold to third parties. We use conversation data only to improve Choé's responses and provide you better service. All data is encrypted and protected by our 7-layer security system.
HelpChoe.faqQuestion5: How do I report an issue with Choé?
HelpChoe.faqAnswer5: If Choé isn't working correctly or gave you wrong information, please contact support@itwhip.com with details of your conversation. You can also use the feedback button in the chat interface. We take all reports seriously and use them to improve Choé.
HelpChoe.faqAnswer6: choe.cloud is our developer platform where businesses can integrate Choé into their own websites and apps. If you're a car rental company or fleet operator, you can add Choé's conversational booking experience to your platform. Visit choe.cloud to learn more.
HelpChoe.faqAnswer7: Currently, Choé is optimized for Arizona car rentals — Phoenix, Scottsdale, Tempe, Mesa, and surrounding areas. We're expanding to new regions soon. Choé knows Arizona weather, traffic patterns, and local hosts like no other AI.
HelpChoe.faqQuestion8: Can Choé help me plan my whole trip?
HelpChoe.faqAnswer8: Coming soon! Choé Trip Planner (currently in beta) will help you plan entire trips — flights, hotels, cars, restaurants, and activities — all in one conversation. Join the waitlist at choe.cloud to be notified when it launches.
HelpChoe.faqQuestion9: How is Choé different from a chatbot?
HelpChoe.faqAnswer9: Traditional chatbots follow scripts and can only handle predefined questions. Choé understands context, remembers your preferences, calculates budgets, checks weather, and actually books cars for you. It's not a chatbot — it's a booking companion powered by advanced AI.
HelpChoe.faqQuestion10: What happens if I have a problem during my trip?
HelpChoe.faqAnswer10: Choé handles bookings, but our human support team handles trip issues. For roadside assistance, accidents, or disputes, contact ItWhip support at support@itwhip.com or call our 24/7 hotline. Your booking confirmation includes all emergency contact details.
HelpChoe.ctaSubtitle: Find your perfect car in Arizona with just a conversation. No filters. No dropdowns. Just tell Choé what you need.
HelpChoe.ctaDisclaimer: Choé can make mistakes. Always verify booking details before confirming.

HelpHostAccount.heroSubtitle: Everything you need to know about hosting on ItWhip
HelpHostAccount.heroDescription: Welcome to ItWhip Hosting - turn your car into a revenue generator. Your host account gives you access to a professional dashboard with everything you need: fleet management, booking calendar, revenue analytics, guest communication, and more. Earn up to 90% of each rental based on your fleet size.
HelpHostAccount.gettingStartedSubtitle: From signup to your first booking
HelpHostAccount.gettingStartedStep1Desc: Sign up with your email and complete identity verification. We verify all hosts for safety.
HelpHostAccount.gettingStartedStep2Desc: Add your car details, upload photos, set your daily rate, and choose your availability.
HelpHostAccount.gettingStartedStep3Desc: Link your bank account through Stripe Connect to receive fast, secure payments.
HelpHostAccount.gettingStartedStep4Desc: Once approved, your car goes live. Accept booking requests and watch your earnings grow!
HelpHostAccount.dashboardSubtitle: Professional tools to manage your business
HelpHostAccount.dashboardRevenueDesc: Track your earnings with detailed charts, monthly summaries, and payout history. See exactly how much you're making.
HelpHostAccount.dashboardCalendarDesc: View and manage all bookings in a visual calendar. Block dates, see upcoming trips, and avoid double-bookings.
HelpHostAccount.dashboardFleetDesc: Add, edit, and manage multiple vehicles. View each car's performance, utilization, and earnings individually.
HelpHostAccount.dashboardGuestMgmtDesc: View guest profiles, booking history, and reviews. Communicate directly with renters through our messaging system.
HelpHostAccount.dashboardTrackingDesc: Optional GPS tracking for your fleet. Monitor vehicle location, set geofences, and enable remote features.
HelpHostAccount.dashboardSettingsDesc: Manage your profile, company details, banking info, notifications, and privacy preferences all in one place.
HelpHostAccount.commissionTiersSubtitle: Larger fleets earn more per rental
HelpHostAccount.tierStandardDesc: Perfect for getting started with your first car.
HelpHostAccount.tierGoldDesc: Growing your fleet unlocks better rates.
HelpHostAccount.tierPlatinumDesc: Serious fleet operators with premium benefits.
HelpHostAccount.tierDiamondDesc: Maximum earnings for our largest partners.
HelpHostAccount.commissionNote: $1M liability coverage included on all tiers. Your tier is based on total vehicles in your fleet.
HelpHostAccount.hostProtectionSubtitle: Your car and business are protected
HelpHostAccount.protectionLiabilityDesc: Every trip includes $1M liability insurance, protecting you from accidents and third-party claims.
HelpHostAccount.protectionMileageDesc: Our proprietary system tracks odometer readings between trips to verify usage and detect fraud patterns.
HelpHostAccount.protectionGuestVerifDesc: All guests complete identity verification and background checks before they can book your vehicle.
HelpHostAccount.protectionRoadsideDesc: Guests have access to roadside assistance, minimizing disruption and protecting your vehicle.
HelpHostAccount.payoutsBankingSubtitle: Get paid fast with secure Stripe payouts
HelpHostAccount.poweredByStripeConnectDesc: Industry-leading payment infrastructure. Secure, reliable, and trusted by millions of businesses worldwide.
HelpHostAccount.payout48hrDesc: Fastest in the industry. Get paid within 48 hours of trip completion via direct deposit.
HelpHostAccount.payoutFlexibleDesc: Choose daily, weekly, biweekly, or monthly payouts. Change your schedule anytime in settings.
HelpHostAccount.payoutTaxDocsDesc: Automated 1099 forms for tax season. Track all earnings and deductions in your dashboard.
HelpHostAccount.payoutBankSecurityDesc: PCI-DSS compliant. Your banking details are encrypted and stored securely by Stripe, not ItWhip.
HelpHostAccount.esgScoreDesc: Every vehicle on ItWhip gets an ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) impact score. Track your fleet's carbon footprint, earn sustainability badges, and attract eco-conscious guests.
HelpHostAccount.accountLinkingSubtitle: Connect your host and guest accounts
HelpHostAccount.switchHostGuestDesc: Link your host account with a guest account to seamlessly switch roles. Use the role switcher in the header to toggle between your host dashboard (for managing your fleet) and guest profile (for booking cars).
HelpHostAccount.oneIdentityDesc: Since one driver's license equals one person, you can only link one guest account to your host profile and vice versa.
HelpHostAccount.wantToBookDesc: Hosts cannot book cars with their host account. You need a linked guest account (under the same identity) to rent vehicles.
HelpHostAccount.howToLinkHost: How to link: Go to your Host Profile → Settings → Account Linking, enter your guest account's email, and verify with a code. You can also unlink accounts from this page if needed.
HelpHostAccount.dataPrivacySubtitle: Export your data or delete your account anytime
HelpHostAccount.downloadDataDesc: Export a PDF containing all your host account information:
HelpHostAccount.downloadDataLocation: Find this in: Profile → Settings → Download My Data
HelpHostAccount.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your host account if you no longer need it.
HelpHostAccount.gracePeriodDesc: Your account is scheduled for deletion, not immediately removed. Changed your mind? Log in within 30 days to cancel.
HelpHostAccount.deleteAccountLocation: Find this in: Profile → Settings → Danger Zone
HelpHostAccount.faq1Answer: Earnings depend on your vehicle, pricing, and availability. Economy cars average $600-1,000/month, standard vehicles $1,000-1,800/month, and luxury $2,000-4,000/month based on 15-20 rental days. Higher tiers (more vehicles) mean you keep more of each rental.
HelpHostAccount.faq2Answer: Payouts are processed within 48 hours of trip completion - the fastest in the industry. Funds go directly to your linked bank account via Stripe. You can choose daily, weekly, biweekly, or monthly payout schedules.
HelpHostAccount.faq3Answer: Vehicles must be 2015 or newer with under 130,000 miles and a clean title (no salvage/rebuilt). Your car must pass our safety verification and be registered in Arizona.
HelpHostAccount.faq4Answer: Your earnings percentage depends on your fleet size: Standard (75%) for 1-9 vehicles, Gold (80%) for 10-49 vehicles, Platinum (85%) for 50-99 vehicles, and Diamond (90%) for 100+ vehicles. Grow your fleet to earn more per rental.
HelpHostAccount.faq5Question: What if my car is damaged?
HelpHostAccount.faq5Answer: Report damage within 24 hours through your dashboard with photos. Our FNOL (First Notice of Loss) system captures all information needed. Claims are typically resolved within 48-72 hours. $1M liability coverage is included on all bookings.
HelpHostAccount.faq6Question: Can I set my own prices?
HelpHostAccount.faq6Answer: Absolutely! You control your daily rate, weekly/monthly discounts, and special event pricing. Our smart pricing tool suggests competitive rates based on your market, but final pricing is always up to you.
HelpHostAccount.faq7Question: How do I handle vehicle pickup?
HelpHostAccount.faq7Answer: You choose: meet the guest in person, use a lockbox for contactless pickup, or enable remote unlock if you have connected vehicle features. Many hosts prefer the personal touch for first-time guests.
HelpHostAccount.faq8Question: What if I need to cancel a booking?
HelpHostAccount.faq8Answer: Host cancellations affect your ranking and may result in penalties. If you must cancel, do so as early as possible. Keep your calendar updated to avoid conflicts. Emergency cancellations are handled case-by-case.
HelpHostAccount.ctaSubtitle: List your car and join Arizona's fastest-growing car sharing community.

Terms.lastUpdated: Last Updated: January 15, 2025 • Effective Date: January 15, 2025
Terms.noticeDescription: ItWhip operates a technology platform connecting vehicle owners with renters. We do not own vehicles or provide rental services directly. All vehicles are owned and operated by independent Hosts.
Terms.section1Title: 1. ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS AND PLATFORM DESCRIPTION
Terms.section1Content:
By accessing or using the ItWhip platform ("Platform"), mobile applications, or any related services (collectively, the "Services"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to all of these Terms, do not use our Services.

ItWhip Technologies, Inc. ("ItWhip," "we," "us," or "our") operates a peer-to-peer car sharing marketplace that connects vehicle owners ("Hosts") with individuals seeking to rent vehicles ("Guests"). We are a technology platform that facilitates transactions between independent parties. We do not own, control, offer, or manage any vehicles listed on our Platform.

IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER: ItWhip is NOT a car rental company. We provide a platform for peer-to-peer car sharing. We do not own or operate any vehicles. All vehicles are owned and managed by independent Hosts. ItWhip acts solely as an intermediary to facilitate bookings between Hosts and Guests.

The Platform may also integrate with third-party rental providers through our partner network, including traditional rental companies accessible via global distribution systems (GDS). When booking through partner providers, additional terms may apply.

By using our Services, you represent that you have the legal capacity to enter into a binding contract and that you are not barred from using the Services under any applicable laws.
Terms.section2Content:
2.1 GUEST ELIGIBILITY REQUIREMENTS

To rent a vehicle through ItWhip, you must meet ALL of the following criteria:

Age Requirements:
• Minimum age 21 years for standard vehicles
• Minimum age 25 years for luxury, exotic, and specialty vehicles
• Maximum age restrictions may apply for certain vehicle categories
• Drivers under 25 may be subject to young driver surcharges

Driving Record Requirements:
• Valid, unexpired driver's license from your country of residence
• License held for minimum 1 year (2 years for luxury vehicles)
• No more than 2 moving violations in the past 3 years
• No more than 1 at-fault accident in the past 3 years
• No major violations in the past 7 years, including:
  - DUI/DWI or drug-related driving offenses
  - Reckless driving or speed racing
  - Driving with suspended or revoked license
  - Hit and run incidents
  - Vehicular assault or homicide

Verification Requirements:
• Pass identity verification through our third-party provider
• Submit to background check (may include criminal history)
• Provide valid payment method for security deposit
• Agree to facial recognition or biometric verification if required
• Consent to driving record check through DMV or equivalent

2.2 HOST ELIGIBILITY REQUIREMENTS

To list vehicles on ItWhip, Hosts must:
• Be at least 18 years of age
• Be the legal owner or authorized agent of the vehicle
• Provide proof of ownership (title or registration)
• Maintain continuous insurance coverage meeting state minimums
• Have authority to enter into rental agreements
• Complete tax information (W-9 or equivalent)
• Pass Host verification and quality standards
• Maintain minimum 4.0 rating after first 5 trips

2.3 VEHICLE LISTING REQUIREMENTS

All vehicles listed must meet these standards:

Age and Condition:
• Model year 2015 or newer (exceptions case-by-case for classics/specialty)
• Less than 130,000 miles on odometer
• Clean title (no salvage, rebuilt, or branded titles)
• No unrepaired safety recalls
• Current registration and inspection stickers
• Functional safety equipment (airbags, seatbelts, lights)

Documentation Requirements:
• Valid vehicle registration
• Proof of insurance meeting state minimums
• Recent photos (within 30 days) showing all angles
• Accurate vehicle identification number (VIN)
• Maintenance records available upon request

Prohibited Vehicles:
• Commercial vehicles requiring special licenses
• Vehicles with modifications affecting safety
• Vehicles subject to manufacturer buyback
• Vehicles with frame damage history
• Stolen or recovered theft vehicles
Terms.section3Content:
3.1 SEARCH AND BOOKING PROCESS

The booking process consists of:

1. Search Phase:
   • Browse available vehicles by location, dates, and features
   • View Host profiles, ratings, and vehicle details
   • Compare pricing including all fees and taxes
   • Check real-time availability calendar

2. Booking Request:
   • Submit driver's license for verification
   • Complete required screening questions
   • Authorize security deposit hold
   • Accept rental agreement terms
   • Choose protection plan level

3. Confirmation:
   • Instant booking (if enabled) or Host approval within 8 hours
   • Receive booking confirmation with trip details
   • Access to Host contact information
   • Pre-trip inspection checklist

3.2 RENTAL AGREEMENT FORMATION

Each booking creates a direct rental agreement between Host and Guest. ItWhip facilitates but is NOT a party to this agreement. The agreement includes:

• Rental period (start/end dates and times)
• Pickup/return locations
• Included mileage (typically 200 miles/day)
• Fuel policy (return at same level)
• Authorized drivers (primary renter only unless added)
• Territorial restrictions (typically within state)
• Prohibited uses and activities
• Damage responsibilities and deductibles

3.3 TRIP MODIFICATIONS

Changes to confirmed bookings:
• Guest-initiated changes require Host approval
• Time extensions subject to availability and additional charges
• Early returns typically non-refundable
• Location changes may incur relocation fees
• Additional drivers must be pre-approved ($15/day)

3.4 VEHICLE DELIVERY OPTIONS

Hosts may offer:
• Standard pickup at Host location (free)
• Airport delivery (typically $35-75 fee)
• Hotel/residence delivery (typically $25-50 fee)
• Contactless pickup via lockbox
• Valet exchange service (premium fee)

Delivery fees are set by Hosts and vary by distance. Guests are responsible for return delivery if different from pickup.
Terms.section4Content:
4.1 RENTAL PRICING STRUCTURE

Daily Rate Components:
• Base daily rate (set by Host)
• ItWhip platform service fee (15-20% of rental)
• State and local taxes (varies by jurisdiction)
• Tourism/rental car taxes where applicable
• Airport fees for airport pickups (10-15%)
• Young driver fee ($25-35/day if under 25)

4.2 PLATFORM FEES BREAKDOWN

Guest Fees:
• Service fee: 15-20% of rental subtotal
• Payment processing: 3% of total transaction
• Trust & safety fee: $5 per trip
• International transaction fee: 2.5% if applicable

Host Fees:
• Commission: 15-20% of rental revenue
• Payment processing: Included in commission
• Premium placement: Optional 5% for featured listings
• Insurance deductible buy-down: Optional $10-20/day

4.3 ADDITIONAL CHARGES

Mileage Overage:
• Included: 200 miles per day standard
• Overage rate: $0.35-0.75 per mile (Host determined)
• Unlimited mileage: Available on select vehicles (+$25/day)

Late Return Penalties:
• Grace period: 30 minutes
• Hourly late fee: $50/hour (up to 3 hours)
• Daily rate applies after 3 hours late
• Abandonment fee: $500 plus recovery costs

Violations and Fines:
• Smoking: $250 minimum
• Pet transport (if prohibited): $150
• Excessive cleaning: $50-250
• Tolls/tickets: Amount plus $25 processing
• Lost key/fob: $100-500 depending on vehicle

4.4 SECURITY DEPOSITS

Deposit amounts by vehicle class:
• Economy/Compact: $250-500
• Standard/Midsize: $500-750
• Luxury/Premium: $1,000-2,500
• Exotic/Specialty: $2,500-5,000

Deposit hold timeline:
• Authorized at booking confirmation
• Released within 3-7 business days after trip
• May take 7-14 days to appear depending on bank

4.5 HOST PAYMENT SCHEDULE

Payout Timeline:
• Trip completion: Funds released after 24 hours
• ACH transfer: 2-3 business days
• Instant payout: Available for 1.5% fee
• Weekly batch: Every Monday for previous week

Payment Methods:
• Direct deposit (ACH) - Standard
• Wire transfer - $25 fee
• PayPal/Venmo - 2.5% fee
• Stripe Connect - Instant availability

Tax Reporting:
• 1099-K issued for earnings over $600/year
• Hosts responsible for all applicable taxes
• ItWhip provides annual earnings summary
• Quarterly tax estimates recommended
Terms.section5Content:
5.1 GUEST CANCELLATION POLICY

CANCELLATION TIMELINE AND REFUNDS:

72+ Hours Before Pickup:
• 100% refund of rental cost
• Full service fee refund if cancelling 7+ days before pickup
• Security deposit never charged
• Protection plan coverage continues until original pickup time
• No impact on your rental history or future booking privileges

24-72 Hours Before Pickup:
• 75% refund of rental cost
• Service fee non-refundable
• Protection plan remains active until pickup time
• Host may offer reschedule option at their discretion
• Priority rebooking assistance available through support

12-24 Hours Before Pickup:
• 50% refund of rental cost
• Service fee and protection plan non-refundable
• May request host consideration for documented emergency
• Support team can mediate special circumstances

Less Than 12 Hours Before Pickup:
• No refund of rental cost
• All fees non-refundable
• May affect future instant booking privileges
• Exceptions only for documented emergencies with protection plan coverage
• Host receives full payout minus platform fee

No-Show Policy:
• No refund plus potential account suspension
